module.title: UI: JS: Messenger
module.description: JavaScript binding to the Hydrogen UI Messenger, which displays result messages after interaction. Now you can create messages while working with JavaScript. There a 4 methods callable: code:js> UI.Messenger.noteSuccess("Work done! What's next, pal?"); <code code:js> UI.Messenger.noteNotice("Maybe you should know that ..."); <code code:js> UI.Messenger.noteError("There was a problem with ..."); <code code:js> UI.Messenger.noteFailure("Ouh crap!
